Text:
season 1, 2 and 3 for this are all available on mino nova dot org (not to hard to decrypt site name

just search for
doctor who hq complete
its well worth downloading to replace others xvid rips
what kind of player do i need to get it to work?
oilovemeo: VLC works.  Any player will work if you get the proper codecs, but VLC has them built in.
I'd recommend CCCP (Combined Community Codec Pack) with MediaPlayerClassic just because VLC's decoder options are a bit limited. But if VLC works fine for you, stick with it!

media player classic would be good
but i'd use coreavc over cccp
